metadata.synopsis: Default dialogue with one of the civilians (sailor on the boat) near the Sahuagin attack on a shore in the Lower City. This dialogue only gets added once
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Use ReCon command "goto 52 3 -138"- "killcombat" to kill all the Sahuagin after they appear and attack.- Talk to the civilian on the boat.S_LOW_BeachSahuagin_Civilian_Boat_f699d950-c10b-424d-98d2-cdce112a3313

0.speaker: Sailor Peete
0.text: I hope the Wavemother sees fit to wash this stench away. It's burning my nose hairs...

1.speaker: Sailor Peete
1.text: Did you see?! They popped up out of the water all around me! Bitch Queen's mercy...
1.context: NodeContext: Still pretty panicked after the fight

2.speaker: Sailor Peete
2.text: I'm glad they're dead, but what do we do with them now? They smell awful already.

3.speaker: Sailor Peete
3.text: They might've cleaned them up, but I can still smell those fish creatures. Worse than feeling seasick.
